Room.Name: Dead End Alley
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the end of an alley which connects to Rum Road.
Room.LongDescription: A small grate has been removed from its vault in the ground, exposing a narrow entry to the cellar below the old wooden building here. Large black cats prowl the alley, and several look at you hungrily. A body of a sailor is decomposing on the ground, partially hidden by rags and trash. A couple of the larger cats crouch beside the body.
